text: 4.9 Lom 16.20, 1 Ko 14.33, Plp 3.17, 1 Te 5.23, Hib 13.20 Takaw nɨbop agñen nɨgtep gɨpek ak, gos nɨbop ñen dɨpek ak, takaw nɨbop agen nepek ak, tap nɨbi ayɨp mɨdɨl gen nepek ak, anɨb okok nepek tek nep pelpel gɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgenɨgabɨm, God chɨnop gek kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨpun ak, ne nɨb ayɨp nep mɨdɨl kod yenɨgab.
